venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
Notes: This is not a meetup event. Roots and Wings Healing Arts Center and Ann are co-sponsoring this event for all who wish to participate. We're sharing this opportunity and experience with you, as it is always an easy way to align and to feel gooooood!

I did these meditations on Oct. 15th at Acara Yoga, and, once again, everyone LOVED it! This time I'll be doing them at Roots and Wings, in Natick.

Here's the selection:

  • Standing Tree meditation: When you'll become one with the soul of a tree and experience all of the resources for life that it can bring you.
  • Connecting to the "Core Value Offer of Your Being", with a Sacred Journey Meditation: Align with who you want to be in the world and what you have to offer and bringing it into all the aspects of your life
  • Spirit's Kisses: Experience the presence of Spirit all around you

    Join us to experience magnificent feelings of peace, love, happiness and hope- essentially feeling really, really good!

    ***If you like, you can bring a mat, blanket, and pillow to fully relax lying down. Or you can use the chairs provided, too, of course. Please arrive a little early to get settled (around 7:05).

    All are welcome. The class is appropriate whether you are a beginner to meditating, or experienced. Please invite others to sign up and join you! Forward this to your friends, family and groups.

    Space is limited, so either RSVP'ing thru this site, or registration is required. Non- meetup people should register by sending name, e-mail, and phone number to: annide@newpossibilitiescoaching.com. They’ll receive confirmation of their registration and a reminder.


    “I generally struggle with being in a quiet space and being present; but tonight’s class helped me channel positive energy and feel good about who I am.” Michele G.

    "Ann's guided meditations are a rare opportunity for me to intentionally dream. The hour or so of deliberate peace and good feelings have become a treasured respite for me. With Ann's assistance, I find myself able to relax and focus on my mind, body, spirit and thoughts. I leave there renewed and inspired every time!" Charlene Frary[
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be on the first floor, in the Wings studio

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: FREE Evening of Guided Meditations for the Community
